name: Sanguis
description:
My entry for Mini Jam 118 - Vampires.

Tileset - https://arks.itch.io/dungeon-platform-tileset

Sound effects - https://sfxr.me

Background track - https://soundimage.org/chiptunes/ (Funky Chiptune )

Font - https://www.dafont.com/dogica.font

What did the vampire say to their human girlfriend?

"See you next month."
